installed._comment: HOW TO OBTAIN OAUTH2 CREDENTIALS: 1) Go to https://console.cloud.google.com 2) Create a new project or select existing 3) Enable Google Drive API: APIs & Services > Library > Search 'Google Drive API' > Enable 4) Create credentials: APIs & Services > Credentials > Create Credentials > OAuth 2.0 Client ID 5) Application type: Desktop app 6) Download JSON file 7) IMPORTANT SECURITY: Copy this file to 'client_secret.json' (without .example) and add your real credentials. The actual client_secret.json is already in .gitignore to prevent accidental commits. NEVER commit real credentials to version control!
